titleStmt.title: The seduced soul reduced and rescued from the subtilty and slavery of Satan ... by R. Junius ...
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sold onely by James Crump ... and by Henry Cripps ...,

notesStmt.note: R. Junius is a pseudonym for Richard Younge.

Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
